title: Tschaikovsky: a musical romance
creator_credit: Fitzpatrick Pictures and James A. FitzPatrick
brief_description: A film of historical interest, it presents a dramatised portrayal of the three romantic episodes in the life of Peter Ilich Tschaikovsky accompanied by selections from his music.
description: A film of historical interest, it presents a dramatised portrayal of the three romantic episodes in the life of Peter Ilich Tschaikovsky accompanied by selections from his music.
